channel.title: Mod/Admin please lock this @ rule 3 my bad
channel.description: [s]Could anyone show me how to add rules interface or ingame time?s]

item.title: Mod/Admin please lock this @ rule 3 my bad
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

I will tell you how without spoonfeeding then. You will need to show an interface which will fit your concept of rules, perhaps something like the quest finish interface then you will need to change the text displayed on it to whatever you want. Same with in-game time but you would show a ‘walkable’ interface and change that, perhaps the game update timer. All IDs can be fetched from the cache, try using Lin’s interface editor to get them and google for the rest.

Read full topic
item.source: Mod/Admin please lock this @ rule 3 my bad
